articles.author: Paul Dobson
articles.title: Market Resilience Challenged by Trump’s Weekend Tariff Salvo - Bloomberg
articles.description: Financial markets, which have shown increasing insensitivity to tariff threats from the US, will face a test at the Monday open after President Donald Trump declared a 30% rate for the European Union and Mexico effective Aug. 1.
articles.content: Financial markets, which have shown increasing insensitivity to tariff threats from the US, will face a test at the Monday open after President Donald Trump declared a 30% rate for the European Union… [+456 chars]
